dialogue.name: welcome
dialogue.page: Hello fellow adventurer!
My name is George Fallis, I live in the nearby house down the road.
Good luck on your travels.

dialogue.name: welcome
dialogue.page: Hello adventurer! My name is George fallis.
You could say hello to Gendry, he may make some equipment.

dialogue.name: welcome
dialogue.page: Hello there adventurer, I am George Fallis.
You should visit Lissandra if you'd want some special equipment.

dialogue.name: giveQuest
dialogue.page: Hello there again!
Could you bring me me that red flower over there?
I am very old now and my back hurts.
I'd give you something useful in return for your favor.

dialogue.name: completeQuest
dialogue.page: Hey, thank you for bringing me that flower.
Here is some copper ore and rubies for your favor.
Gendry could make something out of this, for examble a sword.

dialogue.name: random
dialogue.page: Hey, how is your adventure going?
Good luck on your travels

dialogue.name: random
dialogue.page: Hello there adventurer.
Be safe on your travels.

dialogue.name: welcome
dialogue.page: Hmm, you are new here
Hmmm. It looks rusty. Your sword.
I could make you better one if you have the right materials for it.

dialogue.name: welcome
dialogue.page: I could hear that clanking armour from miles away.
I could make you better one if you have the right materials for it.

dialogue.name: random
dialogue.page: Hoy, have you brought me those materials already so I could stop that clanking armour of yours finally?

dialogue.name: random
dialogue.page: What brings you here today?

dialogue.name: giveQuest
dialogue.page: hey, I've got a favor to ask of you.
My merchant that brings me goodies regurally can't bring me them because of all those pesky slimes on the road.
If you could get rid of them, I'd share some goodies with you in return.

dialogue.name: completeQuest
dialogue.page: So you are back.
So what about the slimes? Are they still there?
Great, I am happy to hear that. Here are some goodies in return as I promised.

dialogue.name: giveQuest
dialogue.page: hey, I've got a another favor to ask of you.
I ran out of all copper I had in store to repair my farm tools.
Thats because my merchant hasn't arrived because of those pesky slimes on time as we agreed.
Could you bring me some copper ore? I'd give you some iron ore in exchange for that.

dialogue.name: completeQuest
dialogue.page: Oh you are back just in time.
Now we wont starve in winter, thank you!

dialogue.name: welcome
dialogue.page: Hoyde fella, Name's Lissandra.
I like to experiment with different unique materials.
If you want to conduct some experiment, you know where to look!

dialogue.name: welcome
dialogue.page: Oi, you handsome adventurer!
Name's Lissandra. If you want some exotic gear, come talk to me!

dialogu.name: random
dialogu.page: So, tell me, Would you like to make something special?

dialogue.name: giveQuest
dialogue.page: Well hello there!
I want you to bring me some slime goo and one wolf fang. I want to try to mix crushed wolfs fang with slime goo.
Who knows, something interesting may come out of it! And I'll pay you handosomely of course.

dialogue.name: completeQuest
dialogue.page: Hii! So you are back finally!
You got the slime goo and wolfs fang?
Amazing! I am on my way to win the next Cobel prize!

dialogue.name: giveQuest
dialogue.page: Hello again!
Would you be so kind get rid of some wolves for me?
They are so many of them that they just staed to kill all slimes they come in contact with!
I am afraid they would eterminate all slimes around here soon and I'd run out of slime goo for my experiments!

dialogue.name: completeQuest
dialogue.page: So you managed to get their population down a bit?
Great, here are some materials so you wouldn't say to others that you worked for free!

dialogue.name: welcome
dialogue.page: Hello. I am the guard of this cave entrance.
So you are adventurer. You may pass then.

dialogue.name: welcome
dialogue.page: Stay there! I am the guard of this entrance.
So you are adventurer. You may pass then.

dialogue.name: giveQuest
dialogue.page: Hold!
It seems this cave is infested with bats. Could you get rid some of them?
I'd pay you of course.

dialogue.name: completeQuest
dialogue.page: Good job.
Now it is a bit more safer.
Here is the pay.

dialogue.name: welcome
dialogue.page: Oh, hello there, I didn't think I'd meet anyone here

dialogue.name: giveQuest
dialogue.page: Would you please help me? My friend seems to be lost in this cave!
Could you find him for me please?

dialogue.name: completeQuest
dialogue.page: Oh, thank god you found him!
I don't know what I would have done without you!

dialogue.name: welcome
dialogue.page: Oh, hey, the old man is looking for me?

dialogue.name: giveQuest
dialogue.page: We actually came looking here for another person and got lost ourselves.
Please could you look for her? She is my daughter and don't know why she would ever come here!

dialogue.name: completeQuest
dialogue.page: Thanks heavens she is safe and well!
Those damn spiders caught her in the web!
She asked you to marry her?!
Well since you saved her and you dont seem like weirdo, I'll glady give you my permission to take her hand.

dialogue.name: welcome
dialogue.page: Oh, my hero! You've found me! *sob*
Thank you for saving me! *sob*

dialogue.name: giveQuest
dialogue.page: Could you tell my father that I am save ?

dialogue.name: completeQuest
dialogue.page: Thank you for telling my father!
I am glad he knows that I am save
